name: Bodyguard!
description:
For Practice Circle Jam #3

Control both the VIP and Bodyguard and use your Bodyguard to protect the VIP!

DISCLAIMER: PLEASE NOTE THERE IS A BUG THAT MAY CAUSE THE GAME TO STOP RUNNING WITHOUT A CRASH.

UPDATE: V2 has been uploaded with checkpoints and difficulty has been adjusted. The above mentioned bug may also have been fixed. (Didn't pop up again during our testing.)
